verses.text: For, behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, doth take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* from \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* and the \w staff|strong="H4938"\w*, the whole \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and the \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w stay|strong="H4937"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w*,

The mighty \w man|strong="H1368"\w*, and the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, the \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, and the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w prudent|strong="H7080"\w*, and the \w ancient|strong="H2205"\w*,

The \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w*, and the \w honourable|strong="H5375"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*, and the \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*, and the \w cunning|strong="H2450"\w* \w artificer|strong="H2791"\w*, and the \w eloquent|strong="H0995"\w* \w orator|strong="H3908"\w*.\f + \fr 3.3 \ft the honourable…: Heb. a man eminent in countenance\f*\f + \fr 3.3 \ft eloquent…: or, skilful of speech\f*
And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w* \add to be\add* their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and \w babes|strong="H8586"\w* shall \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over them.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \w oppressed|strong="H5065"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* by \w another|strong="H0376"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* by his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* shall behave himself \w proudly|strong="H7292"\w* against the \w ancient|strong="H2205"\w*, and the \w base|strong="H7034"\w* against the \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w*.

When a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall take \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* of his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \add saying\add*, Thou hast \w clothing|strong="H8071"\w*, be thou our \w ruler|strong="H7101"\w*, and \add let\add* this \w ruin|strong="H4384"\w* \add be\add* under thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*:

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall he \w swear|strong="H5375"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not be an \w healer|strong="H2280"\w*; for in my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add is\add* neither \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* nor \w clothing|strong="H8071"\w*: \w make|strong="H7760"\w* me not a \w ruler|strong="H7101"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 3.7 \ft swear: Heb. lift up the hand\f*\f + \fr 3.7 \ft healer: Heb. binder up\f*

For \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* is \w ruined|strong="H3782"\w*, and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*: because their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* and their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* \add are\add* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w provoke|strong="H4784"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

¶ The \w shew|strong="H1971"\w* of their \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* doth witness against \w them|strong="H6030"\w*; and they \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* as \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, they \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \add it\add* not. \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*! for they have \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* unto themselves.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye to the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, that \add it shall be\add* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \add with him:\add* for they shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*! \add it shall be\add* \w ill|strong="H7451"\w* \add with him:\add* for the \w reward|strong="H1576"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* shall be \w given|strong="H6213"\w* him.\f + \fr 3.11 \ft given…: Heb. done to him\f*

¶ \add As for\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w children|strong="H5953"\w* \add are\add* their \w oppressors|strong="H5065"\w*, and \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over them. O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, they which \w lead|strong="H0833"\w* thee cause \add thee\add* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of thy \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*.\f + \fr 3.12 \ft lead…: or, call thee blessed\f*\f + \fr 3.12 \ft destroy: Heb. swallow up\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* standeth \w up|strong="H5324"\w* to \w plead|strong="H7378"\w*, and \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* to \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* with the \w ancients|strong="H2205"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof: for ye have eaten \w up|strong="H1197"\w* the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*; the \w spoil|strong="H1500"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \add is\add* in your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 3.14 \ft eaten: or, burnt\f*

What mean ye \add that\add* ye \w beat|strong="H1792"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w pieces|strong="H1792"\w*, and \w grind|strong="H2912"\w* the \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Because|strong="H3282"\w* the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* are \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* with stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* \w necks|strong="H1627"\w* and \w wanton|strong="H8265"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* and \w mincing|strong="H2952"\w* \add as\add* they \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, and making a \w tinkling|strong="H5913"\w* with their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*:\f + \fr 3.16 \ft wanton…: Heb. deceiving with their eyes\f*\f + \fr 3.16 \ft mincing: or, tripping nicely\f*

Therefore the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* will smite with a \w scab|strong="H5596"\w* the crown of the \w head|strong="H6936"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w discover|strong="H6168"\w* their secret \w parts|strong="H6596"\w*.\f + \fr 3.17 \ft discover: Heb. make naked\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* will take \w away|strong="H5493"\w* the \w bravery|strong="H8597"\w* of \add their\add* tinkling \w ornaments|strong="H5914"\w* \add about their feet\add*, and \add their\add* \w cauls|strong="H7636"\w*, and \add their\add* round tires like the \w moon|strong="H7720"\w*,\f + \fr 3.18 \ft cauls: or, networks\f*

The \w chains|strong="H5188"\w*, and the \w bracelets|strong="H8285"\w*, and the \w mufflers|strong="H7479"\w*,\f + \fr 3.19 \ft chains: or, sweet balls\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft mufflers: or, spangled ornaments\f*

The \w bonnets|strong="H6287"\w*, and the ornaments of the \w legs|strong="H6807"\w*, and the \w headbands|strong="H7196"\w*, and the \w tablets|strong="H5315"\w*, and the \w earrings|strong="H3908"\w*,\f + \fr 3.20 \ft tablets: Heb. houses of the soul\f*
The \w rings|strong="H2885"\w*, and \w nose|strong="H0639"\w* \w jewels|strong="H5141"\w*,
The changeable suits of \w apparel|strong="H4254"\w*, and the \w mantles|strong="H4595"\w*, and the \w wimples|strong="H4304"\w*, and the crisping \w pins|strong="H2754"\w*,
The \w glasses|strong="H1549"\w*, and the fine \w linen|strong="H5466"\w*, and the \w hoods|strong="H6797"\w*, and the \w vails|strong="H7289"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* instead of sweet \w smell|strong="H1314"\w* there shall be \w stink|strong="H4716"\w*; and instead of a \w girdle|strong="H2290"\w* a \w rent|strong="H5364"\w*; and instead of well \w set|strong="H4639"\w* \w hair|strong="H4748"\w* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w*; and instead of a \w stomacher|strong="H6614"\w* a \w girding|strong="H4228"\w* of \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*; \add and\add* \w burning|strong="H3587"\w* instead of \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*.

Thy \w men|strong="H4962"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and thy \w mighty|strong="H1369"\w* in the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 3.25 \ft mighty: Heb. might\f*

And her \w gates|strong="H6607"\w* shall \w lament|strong="H0578"\w* and \w mourn|strong="H0056"\w*; and she \add being\add* \w desolate|strong="H5352"\w* shall \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 3.26 \ft desolate: or, emptied: Heb. cleansed\f*
